skills.name: Subcelestial Solace
skills.description: Summons 1 [Yunchi]. A Maximum of 2 [Yunchi] can exist at the same time. [Yunchi]: Inherits 100% of Fushu's stats and deals Hydro Damage to the nearest 5 enemies once every second. [Yunchi] restores HP and Sanity for nearby teammates once every 3s.

skills.name: Holistic Harmony
skills.description: Deals Hydro Damage to nearby enemies. Grants Fushu an Ultra Shield and Increases her ATK Speed. In addition, Fushu's nearby teammates also receive an Ultra Shield and gain [Nine-Needle Therapy]. [Nine-Needle Theraphy] : Increases Skill Damage by a percentage of [Fushu]'s Skill Damage.

skills.name: Archaeus Revival
skills.description: Using a Combat Sill or Ultimate Skill (either it's Fushu or her nearby teammates) gains 1 stack that increases Skill Speed, up to 10 stacks. The remaining time of the effect is refreshed with each new stack gained.
